item.title: Macbook air m1 power consumption
item.description: I found that rsessions-arm64 was running the cpu at 100% and using almost 7 watts, and ran my laptop battery down very quickly. A restart seem to have solved the problem. Using command “sudo powermetrics” in terminal opens up the powermetrics program that’s included in osx which power usage as shown in the following screenshot without having to install any apps: powermetrics
